content.rendered:
Item - where all ideas come true

A professional website building service provider, we provide website solutions that are not only modern in terms of image but also powerful in terms of speed, functionality and user experience.
We are companions, committed to supporting customers from the initial idea until the website is complete and operational. Our goal is to make each project a resounding success, not only in terms of engineering but also in terms of end-user satisfaction and engagement.

Ms. Ngo Chau

Marketing Department - GE Group

"I am very satisfied with the service experience at Item, especially in designing a very user-friendly and easy-to-use website. Besides, what I like most here is the support and Enthusiastic, dedicated and very professional consulting."

Mr. An Pham

Project Owner

"L2T's website making and design services are very impressive. They provide not only a beautiful interface but also care about performance and user experience. Enthusiastic and professional support team, output products fast. I am completely satisfied and willing to recommend to others."

Previous slides
Next slides
• Process

Our approach to new projects

With the motto "don't sell services, just solve problems", we approach each project with a streamlined process, promoting quality. We view each project as an opportunity to be part of your own success story!

Requirements analysis

Listen, put ourselves in the business to understand in the most comprehensive way

Design the UI

Select/design interface as well as features, inform specific plans before implementation

Deployment

Develop the website based on the proposed plan, reporting progress every week

Get feedback

Get customer feedback after each major milestone is completed for timely refinement

Maintenance

Bringing website to the world, monitoring operations, regular maintenance and fixing if errors occur

• Services

Services at Item

Business website

Landing Page Design

Build website solutions

• Why should you choose us?

Benefits of using Item services

Modern interface

The website interface is modern, professional, suitable for your business and user-friendly

Fast website loading speed

We are proud of our outstanding website loading speed of under 2 seconds, with the motto "not letting any customer lose patience"

Compatible with all devices

The interface is optimized to ensure consistency and quality from PC to mobile

Optimize SEO standards

Apply all Google On-page SEO and technical SEO rules and install all necessary SEO support tools

Domain and hosting support

Support domain name hosting management, ensuring website stability as well as customer peace of mind

Detailed usage training

Hand over complete instructions in 2 forms of documents and videos, helping customers easily understand website administration operations.

Full ownership of the website

Full ownership of website source code after design with all necessary features and accounts

Fast and dedicated support

Handing over the website is not everything, we are always with you and ready to support you in the fastest and most dedicated way.

Lifetime warranty

Always be ready to periodically repair, update and upgrade so your website always remains modern and effective

  • Modern, friendly interface
  • Title tab 2
  • Title tab 3
